welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fredensborg, a charming city known for its beautiful royal palace and tranquil surroundings. Get ready to experience our unique culture and rich history, and explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Kastrup Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Angelholm Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Angelholm Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Roskilde Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
